thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 09 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Envestnet Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.17

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Envestnet Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.17
text:
May 9 (Reuters) - Envestnet Inc:
* Q1 REVENUE $198 MILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $194 MILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.36 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* SEES Q2 2018 TOTAL GAAP REVENUE OF $197.0 MILLION TO $200.0 MILLION
* SEES FY 2018 TOTAL GAAP REVENUE OF $811.0 MILLION TO $821.0 MILLION
* SEES Q2 2018 ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE OF $0.37
* SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE OF $1.78-$1.83
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.81, REVENUE VIEW $817.8 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q2 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.43, REVENUE VIEW $202.1 MILLION — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
